Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 86 off 63 balls with six fours and six sixes
Rohit Sharma put on a 42-run stand with Virat Kohli and a 71-ball 77 stand with Shreyas Iyer
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 19 runs in 7 overs
Pakistan lost 8 wickets for 36 runs in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Captain Babar Azam emphasized Pakistanâ€™s focus on improving their powerplay performance
The Kohli vs. Shaheen Afridi battle was highlighted as a key contest
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
India's bowlers set the game for them by restricting Pakistan to 190
India moved to the top of the table and are looking stronger than ever
The team's role clarity and individual contributions were highlighted as key factors in the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jasprit Bumrah's slower ball to Mohammad Rizwan will be talked about for years
Rohit Sharma's innings was described as an 'outstanding innings'
India won by 7 wickets with 19.3 overs to spare
Others: The match was played at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad
The toss was won by India, who elected to field first
The match was a day-night 50-over match
Jasprit Bumrah was named Player of the Match
